mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( username, email, password, nickname, gender, status, avatar, departmentId, occupation ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{status}, #{avatar}, #{departmentId}, '未设置' )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, gender = #{gender}, status = #{status}, avatar = #{avatar}, departmentId = CASE WHEN #{departmentName} IS NOT NULL THEN (SELECT id FROM departments WHERE name = #{departmentName}) ELSE departmentId END, password = CASE WHEN #{password} IS NOT NULL AND #{password} != '' THEN #{password} ELSE password END WHERE uid = #{uid}
